opennlp.ccg.unify
Interface Mutable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Arg, Category, FeatureStructure, LF, Mode, Nominal, TargetCat
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCat, AtomCat, BasicArg, Box, ComplexCat, Diamond, Dollar, GFeatStruc, GFeatVar, HyloAtom, HyloFormula, HyloVar, ModalOp, ModeLabel, ModeVar, NominalAtom, NominalVar, Op, Proposition, SatOp, SetArg, Slash, VarModality
public interface Mutable

Interface for objects which might contain recursive structure and are mutable.

Version:

Jason Baldridge

Method Summary
 void deepMap(ModFcn mf)
          Applies a ModFcn to this Mutable and then applies it to all fields which are themselves Mutables.
